ProjectOverview.pageDescription: Overview of project details and associated plans

ProjectsListPage.intro: Manager or create DMSP project or by DMP

errors.errorRetrievingProjects: Something went wrong with retrieving projects. Please try again later.

form.projectTitle: What is the title for the project? (required)
form.projectTitleHelpText: This should be the formal title if you have already applied for funding, as it will be used to find your Project in the Funderâ€™s database. This can be changed later.
form.radioExistingLabel: The project already exists or might exist
form.radioExistingHelpText: We will search for the project and pull in associated information for you to review and edit if possible, otherwise create a brand new project
form.checkboxGroupLabel: This project is mock project for testing, practice, or educational purposes
form.checkboxGroupHelpText: This is a mock project intended solely for testing, practice, or educational purposes. It allows you to create a project and plans, but you will not be able to receive feedback or publish them.
form.checkboxLabel: Yes, set this project to a mock or a test project.
form.checkboxHelpText: If you aim on publishing your DMSP eventually, we recommend leaving this unticked, so you get the full features. All real projects have a draft status you can use for testing.

errors.titleLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long.
errors.title: Project title is required

ProjectsCreateProjectFunding.title: Do you already have funding for this project?

form.radioFundingLabel: Do you already have funding for this project?
form.radioFundingDescription: If yes, we will try to search for the project and pull in associated information for you to review and edit.

ProjectsProjectDetail.title: Plan: Select a DMP template
ProjectsProjectDetail.description: Select a template to use when creating your DMP.

paragraphs.para1: Have a grant already? Not the right project? Use Search projects to find the project. If found key information will be filled in for you.
paragraphs.mockProject: This is a mock project intended solely for testing, practice, or educational purposes. It allows you to create a project and plans, but you will not be able to receive feedback or publish them.
paragraphs.mockProjectDescription: Remain in a testing or educational environment. Your project will continue to operate in mock mode, allowing you to create plans and experiments without the ability to receive feedback or publish. You may upgrade at any time in the future.
paragraphs.realProjectDescription: Convert to a real project, and remove the mock project status. By doing so, you will gain access to feedback, publishing capabilities, and additional features. However, this decision is permanent and cannot be reversed. Proceed only if you are certain you no longer need a mock environment.

headings.h2MockProject: This project is mock project for testing, practice, or educational purposes

ProjectsProjectMembers.title: Project Members
ProjectsProjectMembers.description: Define contributors and team members and their role in this project.

headings.h2AllowCollaborators: Allow collaborators edit or comment access?

para.para1AllowCollaborators: You can invite people to access, edit or comment on plans by using the "<shareWithPeople>share with people</shareWithPeople>" button.

paragraphs.removeMember: Removing this member means they will no longer be able to access this plan. This is not reversible.

errors.projectRoles: Must select at least one project role
errors.removingMember: An error occurred while removing the project member.
errors.updatingMember: An error occurred while updating the project member.

labels.checkboxGroupDescription: Provide the role(s) of the project member

ProjectsProjectPlanFeedbackInvite.title: Who should have access to this plan?

access.label: What should this person be able to do?

ProjectsProjectPlanFeedbackInvite.para1: When you click Grant access we'll send an email to this person inviting them to view your plan.
ProjectsProjectPlanFeedbackInvite.para2: If they aren't already a member of we'll invite them to join.
ProjectsProjectPlanFeedbackInvite.para3: We have sent an invite to {email}. They will have access to this project.
ProjectsProjectPlanFeedbackInvite.para4: To also add them as a Project Member, <projectmember> go to the Project Members page </projectmember>.
ProjectsProjectPlanFeedbackInvite.para5: They will have access to {access} DMPs in this project.

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address
